question.ask: 1. Would you like some more coffee?

std.value: No, thanks. I have drunk enough.
std.ai: No, thanks. I have drunk enough.

question.keywords: yes please|no thanks|no thanks drunk enough

question.ask: 2. How often do you go to the school library?

std.value: I go to the school library three times a month.
std.ai: I go to the school library three times a month.

question.ask: 3. You look marvelous in this suit.
4. I failed in the driving test yesterday.

std.value: Oh, I’m sorry to hear that.
std.ai: Oh, I’m sorry to hear that.

std.value: Don’t be sad. You’ll pass it the next time.
std.ai: Don’t be sad. You’ll pass it the next time.

question.keywords: how bad news|sorry hear|don’t sad you pass next time
